display_long_description:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[media]

# Complete Edition (Attack on Titan VR: Unbreakable (Base game)+ Armored Titan Expansion Pack (Add-on)) Available Now!
[media]



Prepare for combat with Omni-Directional Mobility Gear and fly head-first into battle! Defy all odds and eliminate the Titans!

Attack on Titan VR: Unbreakable, the first-person action-adventure VR platformer based on the highly acclaimed manga “Attack on Titan” and the latest installment of the VR series. 
 

[media]


# Omni-Directional Mobility Gear
Utilize the ODM Gear to maneuver through the air and combat the onslaught of Titans! 
[media]


# The Titan Threat
Titans rely on their instincts to hunt humans and satisfy their insatiable appetites.
[media]


# Distinct Weapons
Each weapon offers unique characteristics that can alter the course of battle and how it is approached!
[media]




© Hajime Isayama / Kodansha Ltd. © UNIVRS, Inc.

Attack on Titan VR: Unbreakable, the first-person action-adventure VR platformer based on the highly acclaimed manga “Attack on Titan” and the latest installment of the VR series.
